titleStmt.title: Three sermons preached at the cathedral in Norwich, and a fourth at a parochial church in Norfolk humbly recommending I. True reformation of our selves, II. Pious reverence toward God and the King, III. Just abhorrence of usurping republicans, and, IV. Due affection to the monarchy / by John Graile ...
titleStmt.author: Graile, John.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
